item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Devs Offer Free Switch 2 Upgrades for Switch 1 Users
item.content:encoded:
Hollow Knight: Silksong developers have confirmed that players accessing the Nintendo Switch version of the game will receive the Switch 2 upgrade for free.

Team Cherry’s highly anticipated title, Hollow Knight: Silksong, is all set to release on September 4, 2025, and the game’s prices have been revealed. The game’s development began in 2018, and today players have received one final reminder from the developers 2 days ahead of its official release.

Hollow Knight: Silksong Devs Reveal Key Delivery Details for Switch and Steam

The latest Kickstarter update (via GameReactor) from Team Cherry reveals that backers and players who have completed the survey will receive their keys shortly before the release. Nintendo Switch players will receive the game keys directly via email. Switch 2 players will need to redeem the Switch key, download the game, and then download the additional free Hollow Knight: Silksong Upgrade Pack from the eShop to unlock the platform’s enhanced features.

As for Steam/DRM-free: Similar to the previous installment, Steam keys will be delivered via Humble Bundle, and they include the official soundtrack for all players. DRM-free versions will be sent out through the same link, but they “will not be visible until launch.” Surveys will end tomorrow, and players who were not able to make the cut-off will have to mail the developers directly.

In other news, check out Insider Gaming’s preview impressions of Hollow Knight: Silksong from Gamescom 2025. Additionally, check out whether the upcoming game is a prequel or a sequel to the series. What are your thoughts on Hollow Knight: Silksong players on Switch receiving free Switch 2 upgrades? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Helldivers 2’s new update introducing randomly-generated caves, new enemies, missions, and more. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter. 

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Helldivers 2 Update 01.004.000 Patch Notes—Hive Worlds, New Missions, Enemies and More
item.content:encoded:
Helldivers 2 has received a brand new update today, patch 01.004.000, which introduces randomly-generated cave systems, new missions, enemies, and more.

Helldivers 2’s Discord was recently discussing co-op split-screen as a “technically feasible” feature, with many players hoping it will arrive as one in a new update. We didn’t get split-screen, but Arrowhead has released a massive update, which will have players exploring Terminid Hive Worlds, exterminating abhorrent new enemy types, and completing new missions.

Helldivers 2 Update Adds Randomly-Generated Cave Systems, New Enemies, and More

Hive Worlds

As mentioned, Helldivers 2’s new update will have players exploring Hive Worlds, which are randomly-generated giant cave systems that pose a new tactical challenge. While exploring these caves, players will find new disgusting flora and fauna as well as advanced Terminid life. Players will discover acid lakes and advanced bug spires on the Hive World surface, and there will be hols in the room to use the stratagems. Walls are destructible, making it slightly easier to navigate in these caves, but they will surely be dark and scary.

New Missions

The new update will task players with exploring the deepest corners of these caves and destroying the Spore Lung to stop its infectious Gloom from spreading. Players will need to take over the GATER mobile oil rig to extract the mysterious oily substance from these Hive Worlds. Lastly, many missions will require players to collect resources and destroy enemy threats to these caves.

New Enemies

Coming to the new enemies in the latest Helldivers 2 update 01.004.000, players will be faced against four new types: Rupture Spewer, Rupture Warrior, Rupture Charger, and Dragonroach. The Spewer emerges from the ground to “spew its undemocratic pestilence on the innocent”. The Warrior is a Gloom-induced mutation that prefers open-air movement. The Chargers tunnel through the ground at high speeds. Lastly, the Dragonroach is an oversized creature that flies and circles its prey and can also spew air-combustible acid.

Balancing and Fixes

Several new balancing changes have been made, including buffs to the Orbital Smoke, Orbital E.M.S., and Mortar E.M.S. stratagems. Moreover, stratagems, throwables, and Boosters like Mortar E.M.S., Orbital E.M.S., Stun Grenade, Urchin, and Stun Hellpod have had their stagger strength increase. Conversely, all of their stagger impulse have been reduced to zero.

A plethora of fixes have been implemented across various aspects of the game, including Crashes, soft locks, weapons, stratagems, enemies, missions, and miscellaneous areas.

All Patch Notes in Helldivers 2 01.004.000 September 2 Update

New Additions

Hive Worlds

  • Randomly-generated giant cave systems
  • A new tactical challenge
  • Discover disgusting flora and fauna and advanced Terminid life
  • Hive World surface – acid lakes and advanced bug spires
  • Holes in the cave roof will allow stratagems to be called down
  • Destructible walls within the caves to navigate
  • Bring a flashlight!

Missions

  • Delve deep into the caves to destroy the Spore Lung and stop its infectious Gloom spread
  • Take control of the GATER mobile oil rig and siphon the mysterious oily substance from the surface of Hive Worlds
  • Undertake more missions to extract resources and destroy the enemy threat on Hive Worlds
  • Have Super Earth approved levels of fun!

New Enemies

  • Rupture Spewer; The foul Rupture Spewer bursts from the ground only to spew its undemocratic pestilence on the innocent. Upon returning to its dark warrens, it is believed to consume its own dead in order to generate more of its corrosive acid.
  • Rupture Warrior; A product of Gloom-induced mutation, the Rupture Warrior has lost the UV-insulating chitin layer that would protect its internal organs from solar radiation damage. Captured specimens prefer burrowing to open-air movement, a pattern indicative of subconscious shame at their own undemocratic ways.
  • Rupture Charger; When this armored beast senses the presence of Liberty, it buries itself underground to escape its light. Its Charger instincts compel it to tunnel through the ground at high speeds, emerging only to attack those who represent the Liberty that blinds it so.
  • Dragonroach; This oversized affront to Free skies everywhere circles its would-be prey, swooping down intermittently to bespew them with air-combustible acid. A spineless tactic befitting an exoskeletal monstrosity.

Balancing

Unified “non-explosive Orbitals” so they have the same projectile damage and destruction values as the Orbital gas. This effects:


Orbital smoke

  •  Increased Projectile Damage  0 → 300 
  • Increased Projectile AP 0 → 7
  • Increased Projectile Demolition strength 30 → 50

Orbital E.M.S

  • Increased Projectile Damage 250 → 300 
  • Increased Projectile AP 3 → 7
  • Increased Projectile Demolition strength 30 → 50

Unified Stun explosions work. They all apply the stun effect on the explosion and not only on the status effect volume. This effects:

  • Orbital E.M.S
  • Mortar E.M.S

Changed how all stun explosions work in that they now initially stagger the enemy they stun but also without ragdolling the player if hit by such an explosion

Throwables

Stun grenade

  • Increased stagger strength 0 -> 50

Urchin

  • Decreased stagger impulse 15 -> 0 

Stratagems

Orbital E.M.S

  • Increased stagger strength 10 -> 50
  • Decreased stagger impulse 40 → 0

Mortar E.M.S

  • Increased stagger strength 10 -> 50
  • Decreased stagger impulse 40 → 0 

Booster

Stun Hellpod

  • Increased stagger strength 10 -> 50
  • Decreased stagger impulse 20 → 0

Fixes

Crash Fixes & Softlocks

  • Fixed a rare crash caused by multiple players having the MA5C AR equipped on the super destroyer
  • Fixed crash that could occur during hot-joining
  • Fixed a rare crash that could occur when dropping backpacks

Weapons & Stratagem Fixes

  • Fixes for mute AX/LAS-5 ‘GUARD DOG’ ROVER audio
  • Audio fixes for multiple weapons not having reverb applied to them
  • Fixed Hellpod payloads being targetable by guidance system
  • GL-52 De-Escalator stratagem input code now begins with a down arrow, inline with other support weapon stratagems
  • Motivational Shocks Booster no longer applies to enemies
  • Fixed the StA X3 WASP Launcher firemode – it will no longer fire in Semi-Auto mode after switching from Artillery firing mode
  • Fixed guidance system targeting Tanks incorrectly

Enemies

  • Installed additional hydraulic leg supports on dropship Automaton units (they will no longer take damage when dropped from the dropships).
  • Updated automaton city outpost to prevent broken pathing on the bridge
  • Illuminate enemies are now less likely to warp on top of destroyed outpost ship rubble

Missions

  • Updated the design of city evacuation objectives that will allow brave citizens to evacuate correctly
  • Fixed a missions issue that caused ghost objectives to appear during the mission complete screen
  • Fixed issue where the landed Automaton dropships in the Sabotage Airbase objective could be destroyed with LIFT-182 Warp Pack
  • Fixed occasional Charger pathing issues around certain bug rocks

Miscellaneous Fixes

  • Fix flickering VFX shadows in some areas.
  • Fixed strange movement after falling while marching
  • Fixed chat typing animations – Helldivers no longer suffer from fat fingers and will use their writing pads when typing chat messages.
  • Fixed the Adreno-Defibrillator status effect not affecting Helldivers inside combat walkers
  • Fixed an issue where the planetary hazard damaged Hellbombs will visually appear to explode twice when shot by GL-21 Grenade Launcher, from the shooter’s POV

The new patch notes were shared through the Helldivers 2 page on Steam.

In other news, these are the 7 best warbonds you can buy in Helldivers 2. What are your thoughts on Helldivers 2 update 01.004.000, introducing randomly-generated cave systems, new missions, enemies, and more? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about IO Interactive hosting a 007 First Light State of Play event later this week. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter. 

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: No Man’s Sky Enjoys Resurgence After Anniversary Update
item.content:encoded:
No Man’s Sky is enjoying a huge resurgence on Steam following the anniversary update released last week, reaching heights it has not been at in years.

Initially released in 2016, No Man’s Sky endured a troubled launch, but has established itself as one of gaming’s biggest comebacks in the years since, following a wealth of free updates.

The most recent, the Anniversary Update, launched on August 28 and in the days since, the playerbase on Steam has seen a huge spike in its playerbase.

No Man’s Sky Hits Highest Peak Since Launch

According to SteamDB data, No Man’s Sky hit a peak of 98,285 concurrent players yesterday, September 1, the highest total that the game has seen since it’s release nine years ago.

The numbers are narrowly ahead of July 2018, the previously post-release high that saw 97,000 concurrent players, but have edged past that number to set a new post-launch record.

Although still some way off the all-time peak of over 212,000 players on Steam from launch, it shows that the dedicated work from Hello Games has not gone unnoticed, with players still keen to enjoy the massive adventure across the stars.

The signs are certainly promising for Hello Games ahead of the release of Light No Fire, the upcoming title for the studio that has been teased, with a release date yet to be set.

Light No Fire is the sixth most wishlisted game on Steam, per SteamDB, beneath only Hollow Knight: Silksong, Subnautica 2, Deadlock, Borderlands 4, and Battlefield 6.

With many of those games due to be released in the coming months, Light No Fire could rise further up the charts.

Have you been lured back into No Man’s Sky following the most recent update? Let us know in the Insider Gaming forum.

For more news, read about the Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds demo, and take a look at the huge spike of players in Path of Exile 2.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: When is Kai Cenat Coming to Fortnite? Release Date, Launch Time & Expected Price
item.content:encoded:
Fortnite’s impressive roster of collabs continues to grow and grow, with Kai Cenat the latest to be given the Icon Series Skin treatment, and we’ve got all the details you need.

It’s a busy period in Fortnite, with the FNCS Global Championships on the horizon, and Kai Cenat recently revealed his upcoming Fortnite skin with the help of the Las Vegas Sphere.

The countdown is now on until the full release of the latest Icon Series skin, and all the accompanying cosmetics, and we’ve got all the details you need, including the exact moment it becomes available and how much it’s expected to cost.

When is The Kai Cenat Fortnite Skin Released?

The Kai Cenat Icon Series Skin in Fortnite will be released on September 12, as part of the Fortnite Shop refresh at 5 pm PT.

The Fortnite Shop refreshes daily at the same time, though there may be occasions where there is a delay due to issues or holidays, so we know the exact moment the Kai Cenat Icon Series Skin will become available.

In the table below, we’ve highlighted the release time of the Kai Cenat skin in major time zones across the world.

How Much is The Kai Cenat Fortnite Skin

The Kai Cena Icon Series skin in Fortnite is expected to cost the usual price of 1,500 V-Bucks, although a bundle option is also expected to be available, with an expected price of 2,200 V-Bucks.

In the bundle, players will be able to purchase the full array of Kai Cenat items, including the skin, Back Bling, Pickaxe, and Emote. However, the full package if what’s included in the bundle is yet to be revealed.

The launch of the Kai Cenat skin will also come alongside Lil’ Cenat, a new companion pet, and a car body decal. Again, it’s unknown whether these will be included in any bundle.

Are you planning on purchasing the Kai Cenat Icon Series skin in Fortnite? Let us know in the Insider Gaming forum.

For more Fortnite, check out how to get a Precision Airstrike, and take a look at where to find Hammerhead Choppas.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: NHL 26 Release Date Explained—Exact Start Times & Release Date Confirmed
item.content:encoded:
The annual home of hockey returns with NHL 26. One of EA’s many sports licenses is back for another outing on the rink, and if you want to know when NHL 26 releases, we have its launch date and start time details in one handy hub.

EA’s other sports titles are where the headlines usually go: EA FC, Madden, and College Football. NHL 26 is evidence that the company also boasts the NHL license, and many people still loyally buy it each year. A reworked Be A Pro mode, a revamped ICE-Q 2.0 engine, and X-Factors are integral cogs in the new setup.

If you need a virtual ice hockey fix, then NHL 26 is the one. Let’s check out its release date and when you can start playing it.

When is NHL 26 Coming Out?

NHL 26 hits the ice on September 12 across both PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S consoles.

The game does have early access if you want to play earlier. If you’re waiting for launch, though, you’ve only got a few more days to wait. The NHL franchise is a lot more restrictive where platforms are concerned. Whereas EA FC 26, for example, will release on all PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC platforms, NHL 26 is only on current-gen PS and Xbox hardware.

It’s unclear if this is a cost-cutting measure. Regardless, September 12 is when NHL 26 hits digital and physical shelves, and its launch times vary depending on your region.

NHL 26 Start Times

According to the official PlayStation Store, NHL 26 will go live from 9 AM PDT on September 12—with other time zones to follow soon after.

NHL 26’s PS Store listing suggests a 9AM PDT start time. This could be subject to change, but if it’s not, you know when to prepare for the game’s arrival.

Furthermore, I’ve provided additional time zones below to cover America’s large reach, plus a couple of key zones for worldwide readers. Check out NHL 26’s release times here.

Would you describe yourself as a loyal NHL video game fan? Is there anything about NHL 26 that stands out to you over previous years? I’m curious to hear your thoughts. If you didn’t know, the perfect place to do this is the Insider Gaming forum.

Also, we have the complete NHL 26 trophy list showing you how to get all the game’s intangible trophies and achievements.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
